After investigation and consultations with @risko following things were conducted:

  1. Gitlab CI should:
  • run tests
  • build artifact => Docker container with node sources and node_modules or jar file stored inside.
  • deploy this artifact to the Container registry. https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/user/packages/container_registry/
  • notify server via SSH about the success of the deployment operation (stop old container, remove it, start container from latest image version).
  1. Stage/Prod server should contain a docker-compose.yml file with:
  • configurations for DBs (how to start, where to store data on the host, initial configuration scripts for users/roles/tables/etc)
  • configuration of all services (their image names, environment variables, start scripts);
  • startup dependencies for services. (e.g. service Luncher should wait for Authorization )
